column17: The Open Microwave oven works on the principle of magnetic forces inducing heat energy. Here there is no heating coil and the associated power wastage. The bottom of the vessel alone gets heated due to electromagnetic induction heating. Here there is absolutely no risk of electric shock. Since only the bottom of the vessel heats up due to induction heating there is no risk of burns. You can even touch the sides of the vessel while cooking without having to fear about burning your fingers Open microwave oven gives you a clean efficient Eco-friendly safe and healthy way to cook. Operating Voltage: 230 volts / 50 Hz Wattage: 1800 w Outer case: ABS plastic Weight: 1.7 kg (approx) Top Plate: High-tech ceramic Element: 6* Induction coil
